לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not תִדְרֹ֥שׁ <S%H1875><s%> tid-Rosh Thou shalt not seek שְׁלֹמָ֖ם <S%H7965><s%> she-lo-Mam their peace וְטֹבָתָ֑ם <S%H2896><s%> ve-toa-Tam; nor their prosperity כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יָמֶ֖יךָ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mei-cha all thy days לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam. for ever ס sa-Mek

בָּנִ֛ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim The children אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who יִוָּלְד֥וּ <S%H3205><s%> yiv-val-Du that are begotten לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem דּ֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> Dor generation שְׁלִישִׁ֑י <S%H7992><s%> she-li-Shi; in their third יָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo of them shall enter לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem בִּקְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> bik-Hal into the congregation יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD ס sa-Mek
